g++-4.8   -std=c++11 -m64 -msse -msse2 -march=native -O3  -pipe -m64 -Wall -W -Woverloaded-virtual -fPIC -O2 -g    CMakeFiles/031_2.dir/031_2/main.cpp.o  -o bin/031_2  -L/opt/boost_1_54_0/lib -rdynamic /opt/ROOT/lib/libGui.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libCore.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libCint.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libRIO.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libNet.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libHist.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libGraf.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libGraf3d.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libGpad.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libTree.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libRint.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libPostscript.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libMatrix.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libPhysics.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libMathCore.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libThread.so -lm -ldl /opt/ROOT/lib/libNet.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libGraf.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libRIO.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libThread.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libHist.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libMatrix.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libMathCore.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libCore.so /opt/ROOT/lib/libCint.so -Wl,-rpath,/opt/boost_1_54_0/lib:
